text:
One of the reasons I fight for Medicare for All is because I believe we all share a common humanity.

If your family is in pain, so is mine. If your kids are hurting, that affects me as well.

We are a better nation than one that simply leaves the poor, sick and unlucky to die.

Canceling all student debt will not only help those with student loans. It will help all of us — by boosting our economy by $1 trillion over the next 10 years and creating up to 1.5 million new jobs every year.

The real question isn’t who is or isn’t a racist—the question is who is or isn't doing something about it. As president, I will create an office in the White House to deal with the problem of white supremacy and hate crimes. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1172806016213430273/img/muI_Y3a_M5gNkJOC.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1172806016213430273/vid/480x270/JQWUdG5NPUB20wjN.mp4?tag=13

Jeff Bezos is worth over $110 billion. Amazon pays $0 in federal income taxes. Yet Bezos just cut health care for 2,000 part-time Whole Food workers.

That is what unfettered greed looks like.

We're going to make the wealthy pay their fair share and guarantee health care to all.

It was a pleasure to hear from all who shared their stories during today’s #SpeakerInTheHouse event in New Haven. Your experiences are what drives our fight for #EqualPay. And a special thank you to @rosadelauro, the godmother of the fight for pay equity in the Congress. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EEce0vjWsAEuNKJ.jpg

Let’s start with something basic — as president, I won’t have a “favorite dictator.”
https://twitter.com/WSJ/status/1172613453544140800 QT @WSJ President Trump quipped, “Where’s my favorite dictator?” while awaiting a meeting with Egypt’s Sisi during last month’s G-7 summit https://trib.al/1Sy9INb
RT @FedSoc “Who in their right mind would want to be governed by five lawyers in robes?”  @SenTedCruz #fedsocevents http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EEcocKsXUAAHkJX.jpg

You don't pull out your wallet when the fire department shows up to save your house.

The same should be true of health care.

That is why we need Medicare for All — which eliminates premiums, co-pays and deductibles.

We must act. Now. 

Seven million people have been displaced from their homes during the first half of this year due to extreme weather. 
https://www.nytimes.com/2019/09/12/climate/extreme-weather-displacement.html
End cash bail.

I stand shoulder to shoulder with workers at Fiesta Henderson Hotel & Casino in their fight to unionize! I'm calling on Station Casinos to recognize @culinary226 vote and negotiate immediately for a fair contract.
https://twitter.com/Culinary226/status/1172765190804463616 QT @Culinary226 Workers at Fiesta Henderson unionize | KLAS - 8 News Now https://www.8newsnow.com/news/local-news/workers-at-fiesta-henderson-unionize/?utm_source=&utm_medium=&utm_campaign=

I’ve heard story after story about how farmers are struggling to survive because of corporate concentration in the ag sector. We need policies that support family farmers & ranchers—that’s what I’ve fought for in the Senate & will fight for as president. https://nowthisnews.com/videos/politics/iowa-farmer-donates-25-from-trump-administration-to-cory-booker

Happy Birthday, Constance Baker Motley—who would have turned 98 today. She was a trailblazer who inspired me, and many other Black women, to become lawyers. Her tireless work to expand civil rights and access to justice through the legal system will never be forgotten.

Rev. Michael Haynes was a pillar of faith & justice for the people of Boston. Bruce & I send our prayers to his loved ones, Twelfth Baptist Church, & the countless people touched by his kindness & leadership in our community. https://www.bostonglobe.com/metro/2019/09/13/the-rev-michael-haynes-dies/CJdNXYsBbMSz0RVJs8j8aJ/story.html

RT @CaraKorte .@BernieSanders previews upcoming housing policy. Plan includes:

• Expand National Affordable Housing Trust Fund to construct & rehab 7.4m units for poor, seniors and disabled 

• “Fully fund” Sec. 8 rental assistance program 

• Invest +$32b over 5yrs to end homelessness http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EEc4Zj7UYAAE1Jj.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EEc4Zj9U4AAa5M4.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EEc4Zj9U4AEZpaf.jpg
RT @FedSoc “There is a virtue to predictability. If people know what the rules are, they can order their behavior.” @SenTedCruz #fedsocevents http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EEcochPWwAEseBk.jpg

Woo-hoo! I love seeing Massachusetts ready to dream big, fight hard, and elect Democrats up and down the ballot in 2020. #ActionAgendaCon2019 https://twitter.com/HappyMorsel/status/1172882867157962752 QT @HappyMorsel #MassDems ♥️@ewarren at the #MassDems convention today! #WinWithWarren #mapoli http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EEbqsr6XkAMvKCk.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EEbqtznXoAIRp1J.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EEbqvXUW4AEJrsL.jpg

Housing must be a right. We will:

✅Build and rehabilitate 7.4 million affordable housing units
✅Build 2 million mixed-income units
✅Enact a national rent control standard
✅End homelessness
✅Fully fund Section 8 vouchers

Tomorrow I will be on @ThisWeekABC to discuss my bill to stop mass shootings and protect people’s lives. 

Tune in at ~9:25am ET to watch. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EEdsQchXsAAtGnm.jpg

Unlike Trump, I did not grow up in a wealthy family.

My family lived in a rent-controlled building—and that most minimal form of economic security was crucial for our family.

All families should have that. We need a national rent control standard.

I believe in the "radical" idea that young people should be excited about their future. That's why we are going to ensure college for all, cancel student debt, and pass a Green New Deal to guarantee a healthy and habitable planet. Join us live in Las Vega https://www.pscp.tv/w/cE2D0jMyNzU3OTl8MW1ueGV6YkJCblpLWCAR9CnJxKuAtJ3lRreIjnPNmRlJZmjIxogcjeVJt7bp

It’s also another reason why we need to #BreakUpBigTech. Amazon's anti-competitive merger with Whole Foods isn't just bad for consumers—it's bad for employees. https://elizabethwarren.com/plans/break-up-big-tech

Your ability to get insulin or see a doctor shouldn’t depend on how generous a billionaire is feeling today.

Employers stripping healthcare, either by taking it away or worsening it, is just part of the casual dehumanization of working people to increase returns for the rich. https://twitter.com/kate_h_taylor/status/1172247401568120832 QT @Kate_H_Taylor Scoop from @hcpeterson: Whole Foods is cutting medical benefits for hundreds of part-time workers
https://www.businessinsider.com/whole-foods-cuts-medical-benefits-for-part-time-workers-2019-9 http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EESozFcWkAo5Oz3.png

RT @CNN "I met with [Sen. Ted Cruz] because we can't fix the problems that face this nation unless we talk with people who disagree with us. ... If we keep living solely in our echo chambers, we will only hear what we ourselves say." | @Alyssa_Milano, @CNNOpinion https://trib.al/MxrWGcn

Our campaign is about bringing people together.  We have a president fueling a divisive climate that emboldens racists and xenophobes.  Together, we are going to defeat Donald Trump and his bigotry. https://www.pscp.tv/w/cE1jrjMyNzU3OTl8MUx5eEJMVnZZdlBHTu9T_Wd9KgY5d8O9Ha0rHzMO96shPHaVLEWE2ooZfgbG
Landlords should not be able to simply raise rents to any level they want, any time they want.

Border Patrol Agents go out and do their duty each and every day despite the dangers. My prayers are with the agents involved and their families.
https://www.ksat.com/news/texas-border-patrol-agents-involved-in-shootout-east-of-del-rio?__vfz=medium%3Dsharebar

No one should profit off the incarceration of other human beings.

When I am president, we will ban for-profit prisons and detention centers nationwide.

Congratulations to California on this important step in reforming our criminal justice system. https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/2019/sep/12/california-private-prison-ban-immigration-ice?fbclid=IwAR0PeCFTg1P7ogjFngVsjCCpB_x6pEFLVuPOVJdmpnwu8lWLOTTyh1XRI10

This is why corporate “choice” health plans are unacceptable, and why we must fight for #MedicareforAll.

Choice plans are merely a “choice” of which corporation profits off our crisis.

Healthcare is a right. It’s unconscionable that insurance companies choose who lives & dies. https://twitter.com/gregjkrieg/status/1172712763954778112 QT @GregJKrieg Tough stuff to watch, but real — @AnnieGrayerCNN reports from Sanders event in Reno, NV: http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1172712684166533120/pu/img/KQhlPg0ww2LVTl_L.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1172712684166533120/pu/vid/480x270/bmFCYjdVf8Ket0zH.mp4?tag=10

RT @Alyssa_Milano My latest op ed is about how we must have dialogue with those we don’t agree with. 

I hope you’ll read it and if it resonates, Please share it with your followers. 

I met with @TedCruz. This is why (opinion) - CNN https://www.cnn.com/2019/09/13/opinions/alyssa-milano-ted-cruz-meeting-guns-milano/index.html

This week the House passed my bill to strengthen diversity and inclusion at the Federal Reserve. Here's why @RepBeatty & I introduced it: of the more than 130 Federal Reserve presidents, only 3 have been non-white & 7 have been women. That's unacceptable, and it's time to change.

Standing in solidarity with auto workers as union contract negotiations continue for higher wages & new products at underutilized plants. There is nothing more powerful than workers coming together to stand up for their rights & the dignity they deserve.
https://finance.yahoo.com/news/gm-strike-risk-high-as-uaw-deadline-approaches-174227535.html

Wall Street got a multi-trillion dollar bailout with no strings attached, but the federal government did virtually nothing to help struggling Americans keep their homes.

My administration will be looking out for working families, not the billionaires who control Wall Street.

Thank you to @rosadelauro for welcoming me to New Haven for today’s #SpeakerInTheHouse conversation. Tune in here for our discussion on the need for #EqualPay: https://www.facebook.com/CongresswomanRosaDeLauro/videos/979751259036232/
What’s the most absurd medical bill you have ever received?

RT @bradlander Tell me again how we should just write Jeff Bezos a blank economic development check and trust him to create good jobs: http://www.businessinsider.com/whole-foods-cuts-medical-benefits-for-part-time-workers-2019-9
Decent housing should not be a privilege, it should be a right. Join me live in Nevada now: https://www.pscp.tv/w/cE1CZTMyNzU3OTl8MW1uR2V6Yk1CUWJKWEWJ8dBbMSQHwKdQqoWUMpI9IQtK_B8n6KFyNipTjffV

After the debate, I got to catch up with Andrew, who graduated from my Back On Track program years ago in San Francisco. Instead of getting stuck in the prison system, he was able to get back on his feet.

I'm so proud of him. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EEbuFIJX4AETp6K.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1172881512255164417/vid/320x320/nON82fkj9cZwb6r6.mp4?tag=13

Amazon needs to answer for the dangerous and unfair conditions that too many of their delivery drivers are forced to work under. https://www.buzzfeednews.com/article/kenbensinger/blumenthal-elizabeth-warren-amazon-delivery

RT @CharlesMBlow On racial drug disparities: not only were black addicts treated like criminals while white addicts are now treated like victims, black drug dealers got the book thrown at them and put in jail while these corporate white opioid drug dealers just get to pay a fine and walk away.

We have had more people die due to gun violence in my lifetime than in every single war we've been involved in, starting from the Revolutionary War, combined. As president, I will lead a movement for major reform of our gun safety laws. We can’t let this bloodshed continue. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1172805392633683969/img/H3rOywbES3rJOdst.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1172805392633683969/vid/480x270/ocqs6vlD6-93qab7.mp4?tag=13

Almost 150 American business leaders are calling on the Senate to address the gun violence epidemic. 

We’re fed up. How many more people must die from gun violence on our sidewalks, in our schools, in our churches, before Republicans do something? https://www.nytimes.com/2019/09/12/business/dealbook/gun-background-checks-business.html

Transphobia kills. We must stand together and protect trans women from an epidemic of violence against the community that has claimed far too many lives.  
https://twitter.com/ABC/status/1172491899715948544 QT @ABC Domestic violence affects people of all backgrounds and genders, but research indicates that transgender people are at much higher risk for violence from intimate partners. https://trib.al/vlHghmp
Thank you, Massachusetts! If we dream big and fight hard together, we can win in 2020. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EEcl3TcXkAAfG54.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EEcl3TeXoAEvI8B.jpg

I'm heartsick for Bee Love Slater and her loved ones. The murder of Black trans women is a crisis—and we have to act now to stop it. https://www.huffpost.com/entry/bee-love-slater-black-transgender-woman-found-burned-to-death-in-car_n_5d7aa837e4b061b5526a0d1f

I said it in 1993 and I will say it again now: If you want a simpler, more cost-effective health care system, the way forward is a Medicare for All, single-payer program. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Dkl3XYFW0AAqkxv.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1029484959868903425/vid/240x240/ETtq2aWoTAYUwFl5.mp4?tag=8

This is painful to hear. But there are millions of people like John facing an unimaginable burden due to the cost of medical care. This is why we fight for Medicare for All.

Content warning: suicide http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EEb5HfaW4AAZ4WO.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1172897934234607617/vid/320x320/up5n4ZlE72VqC6J5.mp4?tag=13

We have a president who is:
 
Stealing money from military families to pay for his border wall.
Attacking immigrant communities.
Trying to take away your health care.
Cozying up to dictators.
Denying climate change.
 
Dude gotta go.

RT @ariannaijones "I have Huntington's Disease. I'm in stage four. I can barely take care of myself. And I do not have the energy to fight these people." 
this is why we fight for Medicare for All. this is who we fight for. #NotMeUs https://twitter.com/BernieSanders/status/1172900150177685505 QT @BernieSanders This is painful to hear. But there are millions of people like John facing an unimaginable burden due to the cost of medical care. This is why we fight for Medicare for All.

Jeff Bezos committed to providing his employees "important benefits"—right before Whole Foods cut health care benefits for hundreds of employees.

This is exactly why we need #MedicareForAll. https://www.businessinsider.com/whole-foods-healthcare-amazon-ceo-jeff-bezos-promises-business-roundtable-2019-9

Hurricane Dorian devastated the Bahamas, but the Trump administration made the heartless decision not to grant Temporary Protected Status to impacted Bahamians. I joined @SenatorMenendez in introducing a bill to undo the administration’s immoral decision. https://www.huffpost.com/entry/democrats-bahamians-tps-hurricane-trump_n_5d7aae4ce4b061b5526a19cf

200 days ago, Nancy Pelosi and her House colleagues passed expanded background checks, taking common-sense action to prevent another horrific mass shooting.

What has Mitch McConnell done? Nothing but the NRA's bidding.

Do your damn job, Senator. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1171807436736536577/img/as_DetD7EbzfGo38.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1171807436736536577/vid/320x320/qSLZXasQeUOlab3o.mp4?tag=13

RT @DanRather The president regularly lashes out at women of color with a particular venom. I think it’s because he instinctively knows they see right through him, and In their agency lies his demise.

When I was mayor of Burlington, we were the first municipality in America to implement a community land trust.

The concept is now successfully used throughout the country and the world.

We'll invest $50 billion in land trust housing to enable 1 million households to own homes.
